short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and manage all your CKB assets effortlessly with REI Wallet – your one-stop solution for convenient CKB asset management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rei wallet is the wallet built by the community with ❤️ for Nervos CKB, also it's ready for RGB++ protocol.

As a browser extension, Rei Wallet secures your login, manages and trade your assets.

With Rei Wallet, you can develop dapps on Nervos CKB easily!  More details please visit the demo-app.reiwallet.io !

Enjoy!

If you want to donate us, please send $CKB to ckb1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqffhf7ry28ds0aew6u3meft2wxke84yqlsrlystk
